entry.title: SaisumanthT/RSVP-TeamManager: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
entry.content: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
